h2_title: How to Find the Stone Monkey
content: Beyond the clearing where you fought the Son of Stones, you'll find a giant rock with golden trees on either side. Go left here.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'The_Stone_Monkey.md', within the main section titled 'The Stone Monkey', specifically from the subsection 'How to Find the Stone Monkey'.
The content is as follows:
Beyond the clearing where you fought the Son of Stones, you'll find a giant rock with golden trees on either side. Go left here.
